EmailTemplate.name: BEACON AMA Pricing Webinar 2014-08-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Invitation - BEACON AMA Pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for a webinar introducing new pricing for BEACON AMA.
When
Friday, August 22 at 11:00 a.m. CDT Register
Presenters
John Fillinger, Director of Marketing
Kristie Anderson, Product Marketing Manager
Sheila Nally, Product Marketing Specialist
To register for the webinar:
1. Click the registration link above, or go to:
https://badgermeter-events.webex.com/badgermeter-events/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667320906
2. On the next page, Click "Register". 3. On the registration form, enter your information and then click "Submit".
Once your registration has been approved, you will receive a confirmation email message with instructions on how to join the event.
As always, we welcome your input. Please feel free to contact us with any comments or suggestions you may have. Submit Feedback
